items.headline: The OECD lifts U.S. growth outlook — but it’s still a bleak forecast
items.summary_en: The Organization of Economic Cooperation and Development expects the U.S. economy to slow dramatically this year, though its new forecast is slightly more upbeat than one offered earlier in the year.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Kenvue stock rallies off record low after Trump press conference on alleged Tylenol-autism link
items.summary_en: Kenvue stock rallied on Tuesday off a record low, after a White House press conference didn’t offer fresh evidence that could be used by plaintiffs to sue the maker of Tylenol for its alleged link to autism.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I changed my will to deter vultures’: I’m in my 60s and disabled. Do I impoverish myself to qualify for Medicaid?
items.summary_en: “I pay my taxes and insurance, donate money and personal belongings.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
items.summary_en: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I haven’t filed taxes in 20 years’: I’m 55 and about to get laid off. I’ve $1 million in crypto. Am I in big trouble?
items.summary_en: “I have $800,000 split across two 401(k) plans and a $69,000 lump-sum pension.”

items.headline: Your employer can fire you for your views on Charlie Kirk and Jimmy Kimmel
items.summary_en: Disney announced on Monday that “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” would return to television on Tuesday evening.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Revolution Wind operator’s stock recovers after judge says work can continue
items.summary_en: Shares of Orsted rallied on Tuesday to levels where it stood before the Trump administration halted an 80% completed project when a federal judge gave it an injunction allowing work on the Revolution Wind project to continue.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Oracle’s stock leaps on TikTok deal, but a major concern persists
items.summary_en: Trump administration officials on Monday talked up the TikTok deal that they’ve helped arrange and provided more details about the deal’s terms, but they continue to face some skepticism.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Jimmy Kimmel supporters who pushed for Disney boycott take victory lap over his return to ABC
items.summary_en: Proponents of a boycott of the Walt Disney Co. over its decision to pull Jimmy Kimmel’s show last week after pressure from the White House took a victory lap on Monday after the company decided to return the late-night host to the air.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Kenvue says Tylenol is safe, but stock hits record low as Trump makes unproven link to autism
items.summary_en: Shares of Kenvue Inc. sank to a record low Monday, as President Donald Trump warned women to avoid taking Kenvue’s Tylenol, the brand name for acetaminophen, during pregnancy because of a possible connection with autism for the children.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
